text: Iman Ibrahim Noonan, is an Irish Iman to the Ahmadiyya Islamic community. Noonan is Imam of the Ahmadiyya Muslim Association Ireland and is based in Galway at the Galway Mosque.Mosque in Galway vandalised in early morning attack by Sorcha Pollack, Irish Times, Monday, July 29, 2019. Government should regulate mosques and do checks, says Imam Ibrahim Noonan by Cormac O'Keefe, Irish Examiner, July 31, 2016. Born in County Waterford, and raised a Roman Catholic,Account Of Ibrahim Noonan Why Ahmadi. Noonan converted to Islam while living in London, he became a Ahmadi Muslim after reading Murder in the Name of Allah, by the 4th Caliph. He has studied in Pakistan, and the Jamia Ahmadiyya UK institute of Theology, and at the Dominican, The Priory Institute in Tallaght, qualifying with a degree in Theology and Philosophy, from IT Tallaght. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Irish Muslims Category:Irish former Christians Category:Converts to Islam from Roman Catholicism Category:People from County Waterford Category:Alumni of Institute of Technology, Tallaght Category:Living people
title: Ibrahim Noonan
